meanings.sent2: The story was so unbelievable that no one trusted it.
meanings.sent3: It's unbelievable how fast time flies when you're having fun.
meanings.sent4: The number of stars in the sky is truly unbelievable.
meanings.sent5: The size of the whale was unbelievable, like a giant floating mountain.

meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was truly unbelievable!
meanings.sent2: The athlete's performance was so unbelievable that everyone cheered.
meanings.sent3: It's unbelievable how a tiny seed can grow into a huge tree.
meanings.sent4: The view from the mountaintop was unbelievable, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The speed of the cheetah was unbelievable, like a blur of lightning.
